name: Accru - Chartered Accountants
tag_list: chartered-accountants, tax-returns, us-tax-returns, business-advisors, australia, new-zealand
overview: Accru is a network of leading independently-owned chartered accounting firms committed to bring both businesses and individuals accounting and financial solutions. The Accru network is composed of approximately 300 professionals within New Zealand and Australia and embodies a wide range of knowledge and experience. This network offers the personal touch of a small accounting firm with the strength of a big business behind it. Since its inception in 1984, Accru has been focused on bringing together a strong business community to provide prompt, personalized and trustworthy business advisory and financial services. It is a member of CPA Associates International, one of the largest independent networks in the world, linking them to professionals in 73 other countries and opening the doors for client’s international business and marketing plans. Accru provides services in all aspects of accounting, business management, tax, outsourcing, audit & assurance services and wealth creation. Accru holds itself to the highest standards to make sure it delivers only the finest quality work for its many clients. It is composed of individuals focused on providing tailored solutions for every clients need in most industry sectors. Accru is also committed to providing relevant information about the industry to keep their followers informed and updated while making financial decisions. Visit their website for information on Auckland Chartered Accountants, US Tax Return, Australia Chartered Accountants and other services.
